camera.title: Kamera
camera.note: Camera permission is used by the browser to ask the user for access to computer or phone camera

microphone.title: Mikrofon
microphone.note: Microphone permission is used by the browser to ask the user for access to computer or phone microphone

geolocation.title: Geolokalisering
geolocation.note: Geolocation permission is used by the browser to ask the user to share their current location with the website

popups.title: Pop op-vinduer
popups.note: Pop-ups permission is used by the browser to ask the user to allow the website to open new windows

ask.title: Sp√∏rg hver gang
ask.note: A permission setting that specifies the user should be asked each time the website wants to use a given permission

notify.title: Underret
notify.note: A permission setting that specifies the user should be notified each time the website wants to use a given permission

grant.title: Tillad altid
grant.note: A permission setting that allows the website to always use this permission without asking

deny.title: Afvis altid
deny.note: A permission setting that always blocks the website from using this permission
